data.text: Marigina Alatala bata a kɔlɔ a sariɲanni, a naxa,
Ɛ minima nɛn ɛ taa nabilinna yin kalaxin kui,
Ɛ burun ba barika bira saraxan na
“N bata yi kamɛn naso ɛ taane birin yi.
“Kike saxan to yi luxi xɛɛn xa xaba,
Muxune yi e masiga taane yi ige fendeni,
“N bata furen nafa ɛ sansine ma,
“N bata fitina furen nafa ɛ ma,
“Nanara, n fama ɛ tan Isirayila kaane ɲaxankatadeni nɛn.
